programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: After Goddess Nuwa sacrifices herself to save the mortal world, Monkey King comes into being from one of her crystals. Powerful and uncontrollable, Monkey King challenges the Jade Emperor and causes an uproar in heaven, unwittingly creating an opportunity for the wicked Buffalo Demon King to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: A real estate tycoon plans to turn a marine protected area into a new property development, thereby destroying the secret habitat of the mermaids. A beautiful mermaid, Shan, is tasked to seduce the tycoon and stop the destruction. However, when Shan's mission fails, a final, fatal war between humans and mermaids becomes inevitable.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: Young Chan Lok Kwun accidentally stumbles into the Kowloon Walled City while fleeing, subsequently finding purpose amid chaos and gaining wisdom. Bonding with Shin, Twelfth Master and AV, they unite under Tornado's leadership to defend against the villain, Mr Big's assaults, and pledge to protect the safe haven of the Walled City together.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well (Extended Version)
programme.desc: In this beloved Hong Kong comedy, the three Chang brothers living with their parents learn that love blossoms with nurture, but withers when taken for granted through haste, deceit, and selfishness. This extended version features an additional shootout scene that was omitted from the original theatrical release during Lunar New Year 2016.

programme.title: Prosecutor, The
programme.desc: Based on a true case, young Ma Jia Jie pleads guilty to drug trafficking in exchange for a lighter sentence, as coerced by his defense lawyer. Huo Zi Hao, a former cop turned prosecutor, believes in his innocence and launches an investigation. Risking his life and career, Huo is determined to uncover the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Rob N Roll
programme.desc: A ruthless bandit, Tian, has plotted an intense and quick armed robbery. When he encounters Hui and Shui who also plan for a robbery, they decide to team up for the heist. However, their ad-hoc and dramatic robbery has started a war with the police hot on pursuit, putting their lives on the line!

programme.title: Blooms of Happiness
programme.desc: Store owner Gao faces imminent divorce, yet he and his wife feign harmony to spare their parents. On a Chinese New Year family getaway, his mother uncovers his secret and suffers a serious car accident. Enter mysterious Mr. Fox, who offers to send Gao back in time to avert tragedy and save his marriage while upholding the universe's balance.

programme.title: OMG! Mom's Big News
programme.desc: 53-year-old Rita and her husband are planning retirement when she discovers she's unexpectedly pregnant, upending their quiet family life. As they prepare for the baby amid chaos and laughter, they learn profound lessons in love and acceptance. Just as peace returns, Rita learns the fetus may have Down syndrome, confronting her with the ultimate crossroads

programme.title: My Best Bet
programme.desc: Gambling addict Jing vows to quit after marrying anti-gambling advocate Zheng. However, wealthy gambler Ian nurses a long-held grudge against Zheng over a past humiliation and exacts revenge by taking the couple's siblings hostage. To save them, Jing breaks her vow and alongside Zheng, faces Ian in a final gamble.

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad members—Tai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tang—are involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koo's real identity?

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her master's Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fan's daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fan's friend along the way.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: To Kill a Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Kid With The Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huang's father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor's sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: Peter was a key dancer in a dance troupe and applied to be the chauffeur of a rich girl, Betty. When he is rumoured to be her lover, Betty is furious and goes undercover as a reporter to investigate the rumour. They fall in love in the process, and after putting Peter through many tests, they finally seal their love with a dance.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: Dali Prince Tuan Yu knows nothing about martial arts, but leaves the palace for the martial arts world. He meets a snake sorceress and his mysterious half-sister. Through various misadventures, Tuan Yu gains invincible power by sucking the cobra's blood and swallowing the magic toad, eventually defeating his father's old rival.

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lin's husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: Finger Of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous “Finger of Doom”, a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: Long Road To Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mu's lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Li's father…

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho is perfectly cast as a gun-for-hire who always gets her man - in more ways than one! The cast and crew shot on location in Japanese scenic spots such as Mount Fuji; and there are plenty of over-the-top thrills, as Lily even masquerades as a nun.

programme.title: Velan

programme.title: Game Changer

programme.title: Pancharaaksharam
programme.desc: 5 friends read passages of doom from a book that can predict an individual's future. Can they overcome the tragedies that fate has in store for them?

programme.title: Podhuvaga En Manasu Thangam

programme.title: Simmba

programme.title: Laali Ki Shaadi Mein Laaddoo Deewana
programme.desc: Laali gets pregnant with Laddoo's child but he has already left her. Laali then gets engaged to Veer, who is told by his priest to marry a pregnant girl for good fortune!

programme.title: Sarkar 3
programme.desc: Gandhi, a real-estate shark, asks for Sarkar's help in a project where residents would lose their homes. However, after Sarkar declines his proposal, he gets involved in several internal conflicts.

programme.title: Farrey
programme.desc: Niyati, a brilliant orphan, wins a scholarship to a prestigious school but finds herself caught in a cheating scandal after aiding her wealthy but struggling classmate.

programme.title: Ghajini
programme.desc: A short-term memory loss patient sets out on his journey to avenge the death of his beloved girl.

programme.title: Jaanwar
programme.desc: Believing himself to be jinxed, a man attempts to find true love, but instead gets caught in a web of lies.

programme.title: Laali Ki Shaadi Mein Laaddoo Deewana

programme.title: Naane Varuvean
programme.desc: Mohan turns bitter towards life after his wife's death. But Radha, who loved him since childhood, decides to restore his happiness. Will Radha succeed in her efforts?

programme.title: Lakshmi Kalyanam
programme.desc: Lakshmi's life takes an unexpected turn when her family gets her married to a rich businessman, Rishi. However, she is feeling betrayed when she learns the truth about her marriage

programme.title: Veeran
programme.desc: 15-year-old Veeranor discovers superpowers of lightning and mind control after a coma, using them to defeat a villain and dodge a deadly electric blast.

programme.title: Raja Chinna Roja
programme.desc: An aspiring village actor, eager for fame, travels to Chennai seeking his big break, facing challenges, competition, and hopeful moments on the road to opportunity.

programme.title: Salangai Oli
programme.desc: A tragedy separates Bhoomi and Gagan from their fathers, but Bhoomi hopes to find her roots, while Gagan despises his father. As fate entwines them, will truth bridge the chasm between hope and hate?

programme.desc: A tragedy separates Bhoomi and Gagan from their fathers, but Bhoomi hopes to find her roots, while Gagan despises his father. As fate entwines them, will truth bridge the chasm between hope and hate?

programme.title: Aval Varuvala
programme.desc: Divya rejects Jeeva's love due to her traumatic past, revealing her psycho husband. Just as she agrees to marry Jeeva, her husband resurfaces, complicating her life.

programme.title: Annamalai Kudumbam

programme.title: Pathu Thala

programme.title: KCKC - Thondan
programme.desc: Konjam Coffee Konjam Cinema - Comedy and action scenes from your favourite stars' movies.

programme.title: Varisu
programme.desc: Janakambal, a successful entrepreneur, wants her reckless grandson Cibi to succeed her. She brings in Tamil to set him straight, but can he really change?

programme.title: Gettimelam
programme.desc: After facing humiliation from her family, Lakshmi vows to build a new house. Sivaraman joins her in this mission. But as they take on family responsibilities, will their dream be left behind?

programme.title: Veera
programme.desc: Rannvijay raises his half-sister Veera as his own child, while their mother Ratan, though showing contempt towards Veera, secretly supports her son in raising her.

programme.title: Chinnanchiru Kiliye
programme.desc: Indhu, a self-made woman who won't bow or borrow, clashes with Karna, an enforcer of fear-driven patriarchy, triggering a powerful upheaval that shakes the empire everywhere.

programme.title: Thirumangalyam
programme.desc: The story of Lakshmi, an innocent orphan raised by her grandmother. Unexpectedly married into a wealthy family, she discovers her husband Nanthan loves his cousin Dhivya. Choosing not to stand in his way, Lakshmi walks away, torn between her dreams and harsh reality. A heartfelt love triangle woven with deep family drama.

programme.title: Parijadam
programme.desc: After losing her parents and hearing in a tragic accident, Isai is forced to marry Vishal when her aunt Rukmini manipulates her horoscope to meet Subadra's strict astrological beliefs.

programme.title: Ayali
programme.desc: Tamizhselvi wants to be a doctor, but her village's old customs hold women back. Can she overcome these traditions in Veerappannai and achieve her dream?

programme.title: Karthigai Deepam
programme.desc: A gifted dark-skinned woman, a remarkable singer, marries a supportive man, defies beauty norms, and achieves music stardom with her talent.

programme.title: Vaagai Sooda Vaa

programme.title: KUNG FU HUSTLE
programme.desc: From Asia's top comedy star Stephen Chow comes Kung Fu Hustle, the highly anticipated follow-up to his smash 2001 hit Shaolin Soccer. Set amid the chaos of pre-revolutionary China, scruffy Sing (Chow) is looking to elevate his status in hopes of joining the sophisticated and ruthless Axe Gang. When Sing attempts to extort money from a local at the crowded apartment complex known as “Pig Sty Alley,” his comical attempts at intimidation inadvertently attract the Axe Gang into the conflict. The dilemma finds the inhabitants of the Pig Sty fighting for their lives and unearthing some legendary martial arts masters. Sing now must face his own mortality in order to discover the true nature of the kung fu master.

programme.title: ELSBETH
programme.desc: While investigating a death, Elsbeth finds herself fencing with Lawrence Grey.

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE
programme.desc: Danny and Lena's investigation into a robbery gone wrong quickly turns personal, pushing Lena to devise a bold plan that tests Mae's boundaries. Meanwhile, Sean and Jonah face rising tensions with Boston's firefighters, and Sarah clashes with boyfriend Seth over family discipline.

programme.title: FBI: INTERNATIONAL
programme.desc: The Fly Team works to locate missing aid workers and the people who kidnapped them.

programme.title: CROUCHING TIGER, HIDDEN DRAGON
programme.desc: A martial arts film of grand illusion and poetic movement, Ang Lee's Oscar®-winning Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon is an epic love story opposed by treachery and lust for power. Chow Yun Fat (Anna And The King) stars as legendary master warrior Li Mu Bai, who hands over his magical sword, Green Destiny, to one-time romantic interest Yu Shu Lien (Michelle Yeoh, Tomorrow Never Dies) for her to deliver to a local governor. But when the jade sword is stolen, suspicion falls on Jade Fox (Cheng Pei Pei), a notorious fugitive who killed Li's master and secretly poses as a scheming attendant to the Governor's pliable daughter, Jen Yu (Zhang Ziyi). Under Jade's influence, Jen rejects a pre-arranged marriage and becomes a cat-like masked warrior who, nonetheless, finds her transition to the shadow world complicated by the appearance of Lo (Chang Chen), a long-lost love. As the quest for recovering Green Destiny features gravity-defying martial arts battles and surreal tableaus of ancient China, the ever-lasting themes of love and trying to conquer evil irrevocably change the lives of Li and Yu, and Jen and Lo.

programme.title: Below Deck Mediterranean

programme.title: Below Deck Mediterranean
programme.desc: Captain Sandy and three trusted returnees are back for another wild charter season but when two deckies are sidelined by illness, the crew struggles to get the boat ready in time for charter. Aesha worries one of her green stews may be giving her deju vu. A crewmember damages the boat on the first night.

programme.title: Below Deck Mediterranean
programme.desc: The deck team struggles to find their footing, and big mistakes are made. A stew begins to flirt with all male crewmembers on board. The chef struggles to get a handle on eccentric guest requests. Tension between two deckhands escalates to a heated argument.

programme.title: Below Deck Mediterranean
programme.desc: A group of wealthy socialites keep the crew busy. The stews vie for attention from the guys. Meanwhile, the deck team downfall continues as major mistakes cause chaos including a deckhand that floats out to sea on a jet ski.

programme.title: Below Deck Mediterranean
programme.desc: A group of young, entitled guests continue to cause chaos for the crew. programme.title: Below Deck Mediterranean
programme.desc: A massive changeover rocks the boat. A stew gets pulled in multiple and a flirty love triangle starts to heat up. The chef struggles to cater to vegan guests with particular palates and complaints.

programme.title: Below Deck Mediterranean

programme.title: Gladiators
programme.desc: Go up against Australia's wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroo's deadly boxing moves and the redback spider's precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year
programme.desc: In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year
programme.desc: Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Uptown Otters
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Extreme Africa
programme.desc: Follow the course of South Africa's Orange river from its origins to where it spills out into the Atlantic Ocean. Along the way we encounter a diverse range of habitats and the creatures they support, from the dry lands of the Richtersveld to the beauty of Augrabies; this is the story of the Linear Oasis. We reveal how life is adapted to survive along its course and discover a rich world of plants and animals.

programme.title: Big Cat Country
programme.desc: When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Bee Cause - Purple Hive
programme.desc: Australia is the only continent still free from varroa mite, a blood-sucking parasite that devastates bee colonies. Engineers have designed a hive that uses cameras and artificial intelligence to detect hitch-hiking mites.

programme.desc: On Sunday, February 1, UFC returns to Sydney Olympic Park, New South Wales, Australia for UFC 325 which will be headlined by a featherweight championship rematch between titleholder Alexander “The Great” Volkanovski and challenger Diego Lopes. The duo faced off for the vacant featherweight title last April at UFC 314 in Miami, with Volkanovski earning a unanimous decision victory to reclaim in the throne in the 145-pound weight class.

programme.desc: A championship doubleheader headlines the Octagon’s return to the Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey for UFC 316 on June 7. In the main event, it’s a highly anticipated rematch when relentless force Merab Dvalishvili defends his bantamweight crown against the man he took it from, “Suga” Sean O’Malley. Plus, the women’s bantamweight title is on the line in the co-main event as Julianna Peña faces off with two-time Olympic gold medal winning judoka Kayla Harrison. All this and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 - 1
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola - 16
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
